title: When will I be able to buy Elemantalist Lux?
body: I see that she is live on the servers right now and I thought she'd be available this patch (that's what riot said anyway). I've never had an issue before...when a new skin came out the day of a patch I was able to unlock it that day. But I can't with Lux's skin. Anyone know when we can finally buy her skin?

replies.body: I don't have any information on new content until it's been released and beyond the patch notes.  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date.  Hang on until then!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R5VbQyGY,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-23T22:45:43.539+0000)
>
> I don't have any information on new content until it's been released and beyond the patch notes.  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page to stay up to date.  Hang on until then!

still waiting........ nasus and other skins last patch came out day after..... come one dude, this is the skin everyone wants..... I know you want our money.......
are we gonna have to wait until next tuesday, if so im gonna be really annoyed/sad  because i was hoping i would be able to play her during my whole thanksgiving break
Why did he then kicked in the collections if you can no longer buy no logic? : D
